title: Brazil Elects Lula, a Leftist Former Leader, in a Rebuke of Bolsonaro
description: Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva will be the country’s next president, officials confirmed, after a long and bitter campaign between the former president and the current far-right leader. It was a stinging rejection of Jair Bolsonaro’s far-right movement and his divisive four years in office.
dc:creator: The New York Times
media:credit: Dado Galdieri para The New York Times
